newsitem.title: USA: IntraNet Solutions Q3 loss from expansion.
newsitem.headline: IntraNet Solutions Q3 loss from expansion.

text.p: IntraNet Solutions Inc said Wednesday a loss in the third quarter ended December 31 was primarily caused by added expenses related to an expansion program.

The company reported a net loss of $533,654, or $0.07 a share, compared to net income of $14,523, or $0.00 a share, one year ago. Revenues climbed to $6.1 million from $3.8 million in the corresponding period in 1995, the company said.
IntraNet Solutions said an operating loss of $782,839 was in line with its expectations.
The company develops software and systems integration programs. Its shares closed up 1/8 Wednesday at 6.
